predict(inputs) → {Promise(response, error)}

Returns model ouputs according to inputs
Parameters:
Name Type Description
inputs Array.<object> | object | string An array of objects/object/string pointing to an image resource. A string can either be a url or base64 image bytes. Object keys explained below:
Properties
Name Type Description
image object Object with keys explained below:
Properties
Name Type Description
(url|base64) string Can be a publicly accessibly url or base64 string representing image bytes (required)

train(sync) → {Promise(model, error)}

Create a new model version
Parameters:
Name Type Description
